lib/services/user_trip_events_loader.dar.description: New UserTripEventsLoader service orchestrating user/trip/event data loading with stale-while-revalidate caching. Uses StorageKeys.tripEvents with tripId suffix for per-trip caching. Cache TTL: 1h active trips, 24h upcoming.

test/services/user_trip_events_loader_te.description: Comprehensive unit test suite for UserTripEventsLoader with 38 test cases. Uses manual mock classes (MockStorageService, MockEventService, MockTripService, MockUserService) since project doesn't include mockito/mocktail. Test fixtures: createTestTrip, createUpcomingTrip, createTestEvent, createTestEventList, createTestUser.

test/integration/user_trip_events_integr.description: Comprehensive integration test suite for UserTripEventsLoader with 20 test cases. Uses IntegrationMockStorageService with custom JSON encoding/decoding for in-memory storage simulation. Test groups: StorageService integration, cache persistence, concurrent load prevention, full data flow, Provider coordination.
